lineage.Process:
FeatureClassToFeatureClass IN_MEMORY
onartpath \LULC-WS-2\wqs\Delivery\DraftArea3\Basin9.gdb riverine "CLASS <> 'I' AND CLASS <> 'II'" "GNIS_ID "GNIS_ID" true true false 10 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,GNIS_ID,-1,-1;GNIS_Name "GNIS_Name" true true false 65 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,GNIS_Name,-1,-1;FType "FType" true true false 4 Long 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,FType,-1,-1;FCode "FCode" true true false 4 Long 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,FCode,-1,-1;WATER_NAME "WATER_NAME" true true false 255 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,WATER_NAME,-1,-1;BASIN "BASIN" true true false 2 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,BASIN,-1,-1;WQS_ID "WQS_ID" true true false 8 Double 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,WQS_ID,-1,-1;WQS_COMMENT "WQS_COMMENT" true true false 255 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,WQS_COMMENT,-1,-1;SEC "SEC" true true false 255 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,SEC,-1,-1;CLASS "CLASS" true true false 255 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,CLASS,-1,-1;SPSTDS "SPSTDS" true true false 255 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,SPSTDS,-1,-1;SECTION_DESCRIPTION "SECTION_DESCRIPTION" true true false 793 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,SECTION_DESCRIPTION,-1,-1;Basin_Code "Basin_Code" true true false 255 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,Basin_Code,-1,-1;PWS "PWS" true true false 0 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,PWS,-1,-1;Trout "Trout" true true false 0 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,Trout,-1,-1;Edit_Date "Edit_Date" true true false 0 Date 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,Edit_Date,-1,-1;StreamType "StreamType" true true false 0 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,StreamType,-1,-1;Tier_III "Tier_III" true true false 0 Text 0 0 ,First,#,IN_MEMORY
onartpath,Tier_III,-1,-1" #
CalculateField riverine SPSTDS "PWS, NEW-5, v" VB #
CalculateField riverine SPSTDS "PWS, NEW-4, v" VB #

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This dataset represents Virginia's 2014 305(b) assessed and 303(d) impaired riverine hydrology features within the New River basin. Information for the classification of such features is derived from the Virginia Administrative code for Water Quality Standards.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: Virginia's 2014 305(b) assessed and 303(d) impaired riverine hydrology features within the New River basin.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Virginia Department of Environmental Quality WorldView Solutions Interstate Commission of the Potomac River Basin

Consts.useLimit: This is a reference dataset for the Virginia Water Quality Standards. See section 9VAC-25-260 of the Virginia Administrative Code for specific standards descriptions.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.0.3035

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Designation of water body as suitable trout habitat, based on numerical criteria for dissolved oxygen, pH and maximum temperature for regulatory (assessment) purposes.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Class assignment of water body, represented by Roman Numerals I through VII, based on its geographic location or, in the case of trout waters, on its use.
Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) assigned feature ID.
Location of the water body based on drainage basins for Virginia's rivers and tributaries.
attr.attrdefs: Location of the water body based on drainage basins for Virginia's rivers and tributaries.

attr.attrdef: National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) feature code composed of the feature type and combinations of characteristics and values.
Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) federally recognized feature name.
Designation indicating that additional criteria are applicable in this section of the water body.
Location of the water body based on section subdivisions of drainage basins for Virginia's rivers and tributaries.
National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) designation of stream as perennial or intermittent, depending on flow regularity.
Unique feature number of drainage basin.
Designation of use of the water body as a Public Water Supply.
Last Date that any field attributes were modified.
